```{r, include=FALSE}
Sys.setlocale("LC_CTYPE", "Chinese")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
source("../../R/functions.R")
students <- read_mdtable(mdfile = "../../static/database/students.md", skip = 0)
students$Supervisor <- convert_id2link(students$Supervisor, language = "zh")
students <- students[order(students$Name), ]
students$Name_txt <- students$Name_zh
students$Name_zh <- paste0('<a href="#', students$ID, '">', students$Name_zh, '</a>')
students <- students[students$Exit == "/", ]
row.names(students) <- 1:nrow(students)
DT::datatable(students[, c("Name_zh", "Contact", "Entry", "Supervisor")], escape = FALSE,               colnames = c("姓名", "联系方式", "入学时间", "导师"),
              options = list(lengthMenu = c(nrow(students), 5, 10)))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
for (i in 1:nrow(students)){
  cat('## ', students$Name_txt[i], '<a name="', students$ID[i], '"></a>', ' \n\n',
      '<img src="../../../img/students/', students$ID[i], '.jpg" style="display: block; margin: auto;">', '\n\n',
      '联系方式: ', students$Contact[i], '\n\n',
      '导师: ', students$Supervisor[i], '\n\n',
      students$Intro_zh[i], '\n\n[*回到顶部*](#TOP)\n\n', sep = '')
}
```
